class.name: ScriptEditorBase
class.brief_description: Base editor for editing scripts in the [ScriptEditor].
class.description: Base editor for editing scripts in the [ScriptEditor]. This does not include documentation items.

method.name: add_syntax_highlighter
method.description: Adds a [EditorSyntaxHighlighter] to the open script.

method.name: get_base_editor
method.description: Returns the underlying [Control] used for editing scripts. For text scripts, this is a [CodeEdit].

signal.name: go_to_help
signal.description: Emitted when the user requests a specific documentation page.

signal.name: go_to_method
signal.description: Emitted when the user requests to view a specific method of a script, similar to [signal request_open_script_at_line].

signal.name: name_changed
signal.description: Emitted after script validation or when the edited resource has changed.

signal.name: replace_in_files_requested
signal.description: Emitted when the user request to find and replace text in the file system.

signal.name: request_help
signal.description: Emitted when the user requests contextual help.

signal.name: request_open_script_at_line
signal.description: Emitted when the user requests to view a specific line of a script, similar to [signal go_to_method].

signal.name: request_save_history
signal.description: Emitted when the user contextual goto and the item is in the same script.

signal.name: request_save_previous_state
signal.description: Emitted when the user changes current script or moves caret by 10 or more columns within the same script.

signal.name: search_in_files_requested
signal.description: Emitted when the user request to search text in the file system.
